Hi,

I am trying to automate building Junit tests and email the test-
resul=
ts (html format).

I am able to get email but it also contains lot of crap =
in addition 
to attached test-result. I want to get rid of that and I have =
tried 
a lot but it never goes away. Please help!

Following is the part of=
 build.xml -->

	<target name=3D"mail" depends=3D"junit">
		<mail mailhost=
=3D"mail.XXXXX.XXX(masking this)" 
subject=3D"Test build" messagemimetype=

reports}/junit-noframes.html">

ss=3D"pradeep.yadav@..."/>

oracle.com"

ge>MyCompany : Junit Test

t I should only get junit-noframes.html as body of email

p.
